Headline: #22 Clark Temporary Reroute at Clark/ Addison
ShortDescription: 22 Clark buses are temporarily rerouted via Clark, Racine, Belmont and Clark due to, event traffic at Clark/ Addison.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#22 Clark buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Clark, Racine, Belmont and Clark, due to event traffic at Clark/ Addison.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Yellow Line Line Delays
ShortDescription: Yellow Line trains are running w/residual delays following track switching problems at Howard. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Yellow Line trains are running with residual delays following track switching problems at Howard.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
